price: 100. Аллоҳнинг изну иродасисиз ҳеч бир жон мўмин бўла олмас. У (Аллоҳ) ақл юргизмайдиган кимсаларни азобга дучор қилур.
arabic: وَمَا كَانَ لِنَفۡسٍ أَن تُؤۡمِنَ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِۚ وَيَجۡعَلُ ٱلرِّجۡسَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Uzbek translation - Alauddin Mansour
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Alauddin Mansour, printed in 1430 H. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā kāna linafsin an tu'mina illā bi-idh'ni al-lahi wayajʿalu al-rij'sa ʿalā alladhīna lā yaʿqilūna
